
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_executable(ydb-library-table_creator-ut)
target_compile_options(ydb-library-table_creator-ut PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)
target_include_directories(ydb-library-table_creator-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/table_creator
)
target_link_libraries(ydb-library-table_creator-ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  ydb-library-table_creator
  cpp-testing-unittest
  core-testlib-default
  udf-service-exception_policy
  yql-sql-pg_dummy
  cpp-client-ydb_driver
)
target_link_options(ydb-library-table_creator-ut PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
  -lutil
)
target_sources(ydb-library-table_creator-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/table_creator/table_creator_ut.cpp
)
set_property(
  TARGET
  ydb-library-table_creator-ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  10
)
add_yunittest(
  NAME
  ydb-library-table_creator-ut
  TEST_TARGET
  ydb-library-table_creator-ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-library-table_creator-ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-library-table_creator-ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-library-table_creator-ut
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)
target_allocator(ydb-library-table_creator-ut
  cpp-malloc-tcmalloc
  libs-tcmalloc-no_percpu_cache
)
vcs_info(ydb-library-table_creator-ut)
